column1: Smoque BBQ////I thought the brisket was the star of the show. It was super tender and juicy and tasted amazing with any of the sauces. Ribs were good
column2: nice and smokey. Out of all the sides we got
column3: I enjoyed the beans and fries the most. I'm not usually a beans type of person
column4: but the Smoque version was bursting with flavor. The fries were hot and fresh and tasted great dipped in BBQ sauce. Cornbread was decent although I couldn't tell you what constitutes good cornbread (I might have been too full to appreciate it). The biggest disappointment was the mac & cheese. The "large" we got was simply two of their pre-portioned containers
column5: which are pretty small. Honestly it tasted pretty bland and the texture was not creamy or cheesy whatsoever. Would skip next time.
